#include<stdio.h>
int factorial(int q)
{
    int z, fact = 1;
    for(z = q; z >= 1; z--)
        fact = fact * z;
    return fact;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int k = 0,i,a,j,n,slots = 0,players = 0,y,x,b,c,ans,w;
        int score[12];
        for (i = 1; i <= 11; i++)
            scanf("%d", &score[i]);
        scanf("%d",&n);
        for (i = 1; i <= 11; i++)
        {
            for (j = i + 1; j <= 11; j++)
            {
                if (score[i] < score[j])
                {
                    a = score[i];
                    score[i] = score[j];
                    score[j] = a;
                }
            }
        }
        //for(i = 1; i <= 11; i++)
        //printf("%d ",score[i]);
        w = n;
        while(n >= 2)
        {
            if(score[n] == score[n-1])
            {
                slots++;
                players++;
                n--;
            }
            else
                break;
        }
        while(w<11)
        {
            if(score[w] == score[w+1])
            {
                players++;
                w++;
            }
            else
                break;
        }
        //printf("%d %d\n",players,slots);
        y = players + 1;
        x = slots + 1;
        //printf("%d %d\n",x,y);
        a = factorial(y);
        b = factorial(x);
        c = factorial((y-x));
        ans = a / (b * c);
        printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
}
